text:
Hey John, I don’t _think_ we do a refresh if delete a module in a dnd area (though we may if the module was in a flex column?). What cases are you seeing an auto refresh happening? If I remember right, it should only be if:
• you added a module that has JS on it, we insta refresh so the JS associated with the module can execute (incase it’s involved with rendering or osmething)
• If you modify a module that has JS on it, a refresh should happen if you hit the back button in the top left of a modules edit form.
